channel.title: Hardening Parrot (Home Edition)
channel.description:
Trying to apply kicksecure's hardenings to Parrot Home edition (Vbox), but i ran into some problems. Here is the output: sudo apt install --no-install-recommends kicksecure-cli-vm Reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree... Done Reading state information... Done Some packages could not be installed. This may mean that you have requested an impossible situation or if you are using the unstable distribution that some required packages have not yet been created or been moved out of Incoming. The following information may help to resolve the situation:
The following packages have unmet dependencies: kicksecure-recommended-cli : Depends: libblockdev-crypto2 but it is not installable plymouth : Conflicts: console-common but 0.7.91 is to be installed : Error, pkgProblemResolver::Resolve generated breaks, this may be caused by held packages.
Already tried and searched for many solutions, but none of them really solved my problem. Someone can help me?

item.title: Hardening Parrot (Home Edition)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
That distribution is unsupported.

Kicksecure – 15 Dec 23

Undocumented, Untested or Unsupported Features

This feature is either undocumented, untested, or unsupported. Options: Become a Contributor / Apply Self Support First Policy / Purchase Premium Support.

  1. Try uninstall plymouth.

  2. See also: Broken APT

Read full topic

item.title: Hardening Parrot (Home Edition)
item.dc:creator: lavontay
item.description:
Trying to apply kicksecure’s hardenings to Parrot Home edition (Vbox), but i ran into some problems. Here is the output:
sudo apt install --no-install-recommends kicksecure-cli-vm
Reading package lists… Done
Building dependency tree… Done
Reading state information… Done
Some packages could not be installed. This may mean that you have
requested an impossible situation or if you are using the unstable
distribution that some required packages have not yet been created
or been moved out of Incoming.
The following information may help to resolve the situation:

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
kicksecure-recommended-cli : Depends: libblockdev-crypto2 but it is not installable
plymouth : Conflicts: console-common but 0.7.91 is to be installed
: Error, pkgProblemResolver::Resolve generated breaks, this may be caused by held packages.

Already tried and searched for many solutions, but none of them really solved my problem. Someone can help me?

Read full topic
